name: Grey Matter Designz
description:
Grey Matter Designz was created out of a simple thought.Â 
Bring cutting edge web design, creative content, and internet marketing together with top notch customer service. One of our clients put it this way "boutique style experience."
We are in an industry where emailing and waiting days for a response is the norm. We have set out to change that. Our clients are surprised that when they call or send us a message we answer. We love what we do and it shows in our work.
